name: Surviving Eskom
description:
Surviving Eskom is a first-person puzzle simulation game based in South Africa where load shedding is commonly well-known for being disruptive, annoying, inconvenient, and simply outright frustrating. In Surviving Eskom, you’ll need to deal with real-world problems linked to load-shedding by monitoring your energy levels/resources to survive before, during, and after load-shedding.
